member.name: T:TuaRua.FreSharp.FreArraySharp
member.summary: FreArraySharp wraps a C FREObject (Array or Vector) with helper methods.

member.name: M:TuaRua.FreSharp.FreArraySharp.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an Empty C# FreArray.

member.name: M:TuaRua.FreSharp.FreArraySharp.#ctor(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Creates a C# FreArray from a C FREObject.

member.name: M:TuaRua.FreSharp.FreArraySharp.GetLength
member.summary: Returns the length of the C# FreArray.

member.name: M:TuaRua.FreSharp.FreArraySharp.GetObjectAt(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Returns the C# FreObject from the C# FreArray at i.

member.name: M:TuaRua.FreSharp.FreArraySharp.SetObjectAt(TuaRua.FreSharp.FreObjectSharp,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Sets the C# FreObject in the C# FreArray at i.

member.name: T:TuaRua.FreSharp.Display.FreBitmapDataSharp
member.summary: FreBitmapDataSharp wraps a C FREBitmapData with helper methods.

member.name: P:TuaRua.FreSharp.Display.FreBitmapDataSharp.RawValue
member.summary: Returns the associated C FREBitmapData2 of the C# FREBitmapData.

member.name: F:TuaRua.FreSharp.Display.FreBitmapDataSharp.Width
member.summary: An int that specifies the width, in pixels, of the bitmap. This value corresponds to the width property of the ActionScript BitmapData class object. This field is read-only.

member.name: F:TuaRua.FreSharp.Display.FreBitmapDataSharp.Height
member.summary: An int that specifies the height, in pixels, of the bitmap. This value corresponds to the height property of the ActionScript BitmapData class object. This field is read-only.

member.name: F:TuaRua.FreSharp.Display.FreBitmapDataSharp.HasAlpha
member.summary: A bool that indicates whether the bitmap supports per-pixel transparency. This value corresponds to the transparent property of the ActionScript BitmapData class object. If the value is non-zero, then the pixel format is ARGB32. If the value is zero, the pixel format is _RGB32. Whether the value is big endian or little endian depends on the host device. This field is read-only.

member.name: F:TuaRua.FreSharp.Display.FreBitmapDataSharp.IsPremultiplied
member.summary: A bool that indicates whether the bitmap pixels are stored as premultiplied color values. This field is read-only.

member.name: F:TuaRua.FreSharp.Display.FreBitmapDataSharp.IsInvertedY
member.summary: A bool that indicates the order in which the rows of bitmap data in the image are stored. A non-zero value means that the bottom row of the image appears first in the image data (in other words, the first value in the bits32 array is the first pixel of the last row in the image). This field is read-only.

member.name: F:TuaRua.FreSharp.Display.FreBitmapDataSharp.LineStride32
member.summary: An int that specifies the number of int values per scanline. This value is typically the same as the width parameter. This field is read-only.

member.name: F:TuaRua.FreSharp.Display.FreBitmapDataSharp.Bits32
member.summary: A pointer to a int. This value is an array of int values. Each value is one pixel of the bitmap.

member.name: M:TuaRua.FreSharp.Display.FreBitmapDataSharp.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an empty C# FREBitmapData

member.name: M:TuaRua.FreSharp.Display.FreBitmapDataSharp.#ctor(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Creates a C# FREBitmapData from a C FREBitmapData2

member.name: M:TuaRua.FreSharp.Display.FreBitmapDataSharp.#ctor(System.Drawing.Bitmap)
member.summary: Creates a C# FREBitmapData from a C# Bitmap

member.name: M:TuaRua.FreSharp.Display.FreBitmapDataSharp.Release
member.summary: Calls FREReleaseBitmapData on the C FREBitmapData2

member.name: M:TuaRua.FreSharp.Display.FreBitmapDataSharp.Acquire
member.summary: Calls FREAcquireBitmapData2 on the C FREBitmapData2

member.name: M:TuaRua.FreSharp.Display.FreBitmapDataSharp.InvalidateBitmapDataRect(System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Calls FREInvalidateBitmapDataRect on the C FREBitmapData2

member.name: M:TuaRua.FreSharp.Display.FreBitmapDataSharp.GetAsBitmap
member.summary: Converts the FREBitmapData into a C# Bitmap
